[SNF API Reference]

Detailed Description

Structure to map Interfaces to Sniffer board numbers

Field Documentation

struct snf_ifaddrs* snf_ifaddrs::snf_ifa_next

next item or NULL if last

const char* snf_ifaddrs::snf_ifa_name

interface name, as in ifconfig

snf board number

int snf_ifaddrs::snf_ifa_maxrings

uint8_t snf_ifaddrs::pad[2]

int snf_ifaddrs::snf_ifa_maxinject

Maximum TX injection handles supported
